channel.title: Post your stereo setup?
channel.description:
Here is my $5 stereo, (the stock gray speakers in bottom/back), along with a $50 (got them for 20) set of desktop speakers. (the nice black/gray ones in front) [img]http://i50.tinypic.com/dcfoft.jpg[/img]
Right now it is turned almost all the way down, and my G'Ma is complaining from downstairs. What is currently playing you ask? White Zombie - Black Sunshine
Post yours :)
No pic we can find on google either, yours, or none.

item.title: Post your stereo setup?
item.dc:creator: @pure2ownage Pure_
item.description:
@pure2ownage wrote:

[quote=“CoonHunter, post:15, topic:343018”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=439421.msg3229173#msg3229173 date=1275868026]

Krackkid, I’m totally going to come into your house, and steal your system. I will use those speakers for my backups.

Did you forget I am a ninja/army dude o.o?

I don’t care, I have feet, and a shitload of will power. My mommy says, as long as I have the will, I can do anything.

No, I’m not actually that childish lolz, I just saw that in a movie.

LOL, will power FTW!
[/quote]

Lol, ikr?[/quote]WILL POWA IS LIEK POWA PUFF GURLZ DAZ SO AWSUMZ1!1!!!
My mummy sais if i gotz problemz my dadz gun bring gun tu skl to i be scared

Read full topic

item.title: Post your stereo setup?
item.dc:creator: @marcbob marcbob
item.description:
@marcbob wrote:

[quote=“The Reaper X, post:17, topic:343018”][quote author=krackkid link=topic=439421.msg3229733#msg3229733 date=1275937077]
Ok what about everyone else?
[/quote]I don’t bother to spend money on a system for myself to listen to when I can buy one for my car where everyone will hear it.

I’m buying them this summer. Two JL audio 12" subwoofers. I will definitely have the money by the end of next week.

http://mobile.jlaudio.com/products_subs.php?series_id=4[/quote]

ya i cant drive but my brother has 2 12’ subs in his car and im pretty sure their alpines but im not sure technical stuff but he says they were like 1200$ and the amp was 500$ and then he has sweet headunit and reg speakers

Read full topic
